Articles.Content:
I zipped up the files, it's a slide show, and you have to view them in order. The mission of the first Kerbal Interstellar Probe can be found here: https://app.box.com/s/67riuu5hwk2iq4k49bjk

the Odin/lifter vehicle is my own design, and I will share it if I can find the file. it surpassed all of my expectations. Of course, Kerbals had to die to make it a reality, but Kerbin is better because a few brave Kerbals sacrificed themselves for science. Rest in peace, you brave souls...
